Modules¶

protocol.make_response(request, code, data=None)[source]¶

Function for preparing a request :param request: client request :param code: server-answer code :param data: server-answer data :return: dictionary request

protocol.validate_request(request)[source]¶

Function to validate simple client request :param request: raw client request :return: bool value - validation solution

  • Example::

    {‘action’: ‘echo’, ‘time’: ‘’}
